price: ‘সিহঁতৰ হিচাপ লোৱাটো হৈছে মোৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ কাম; যদি তোমালোকে বুজি পালাহেঁতেন!
arabic: إِنۡ حِسَابُهُمۡ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّيۖ لَوۡ تَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: in ḥisābuhum illā ʿalā rabbī law tashʿurūna
